position: Associate Data Scientist @ Digit insurance || FarEye || IIT Kharagpur

experience.title: Associate Data Scientist
experience.description: * Developed ML model for motor policy renewal prediction . EDA , feature engineering, hyper parameter tuning and researched on the feature affecting in policy renewal . * Created statistical method to auto assignment of TP claim to the investigator.* Flood risk analysis based on daily , weekly and monthly rainfall data from IMD . Used GeoPandas technology for better geographical analysis . * Worked on Loss making segment analysis of Private vehicle policy based on demographic and geographic feature .* Working on Epidemic analysis on village level  weekly disease outbreak data available on govt. sources as pdf . Used various tools to extract data from pdf like Azure form recognizer , pypdf , camelot , etc . Used google API to fetch latitude and longitude from address of epidemic . Used GeoPandas for better visual analysis . * Worked on motor claim fraud analysis using Neo4j technology and rule based analysis which is common insurance fraud claim . * Worked on server outage prediction by CPU and memory usage forecasting with 5 minute interval  . Used various time series model AR model , ARIMA , SARIMAX ,Random walk , FbProphet , LSTM and ARIMA-ANN . hybrid model .
experience.description_html: * Developed ML model for motor policy renewal prediction . EDA , feature engineering, hyper parameter tuning and researched on the feature affecting in policy renewal . * Created statistical method to auto assignment of TP claim to the investigator.* Flood risk analysis based on daily , weekly and monthly rainfall data from IMD . Used GeoPandas technology for better geographical analysis . * Worked on Loss making segment analysis of Private vehicle policy based on demographic and geographic feature .* Working on Epidemic analysis on village level weekly disease outbreak data available on govt. sources as pdf . Used various tools to extract data from pdf like Azure form recognizer , pypdf , camelot , etc . Used google API to fetch latitude and longitude from address of epidemic . Used GeoPandas for better visual analysis . * Worked on motor claim fraud analysis using Neo4j technology and rule based analysis which is common insurance fraud claim . * Worked on server outage prediction by CPU and memory usage forecasting with 5 minute interval . Used various time series model AR model , ARIMA , SARIMAX ,Random walk , FbProphet , LSTM and ARIMA-ANN . hybrid model .
